article: secretary of state colin powell conferred by telephone wednesday with prime minister ariel sharon of israel and mahmoud abbas , the new palestinian prime minister , as the u.s. administration geared up to seek a palestinian state by #### .
abstract: administration ready to present plan push for palestinian state
